name: if "it" ends
description:
"it" is about to end soon, "it" is up to you to keep "it" going!

"if it ends" is a game where "it" is an acronym for a pair of words. An adjective that begins with "I" and a noun that begins with "T" (for example: "Idiotic Teenager")

your job is to make as many of these word pairs before the time is up. In short, your job is to make sure that "IT" never ends.

💛 a game made by Danzel Serrano 💛

ig: @deezyyeezy

soundcloud: soundcloud.com/deeziox
